thread.section_title: Sparkles Make It Special Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sparkles Make It Special | sparklesmakeitspecial.com
thread.title: SUSAN GOLDSTEIN
thread.title_full: Sparkles Make It Special reviewed by SUSAN GOLDSTEIN

author: SUSAN GOLDSTEIN
title: SUSAN GOLDSTEIN
text: I love all things that sparkle and glitter. The favor boxes that Sparkles Make It Special have enough glitter on them to satisfy the biggest sparkle lovers. I have ordered them in 6 different colors. They come in quantities of 10 per package. They are easy to assemble and it can be folded into boxes within 10 to 15 seconds. Quite a bit of the glitter comes off while you are folding and handling the boxes and when I get finished packing them up I have glitter all over me. But, I do love glitter so I just dust it off onto the floor and vacuum it away, I add butterflies to the top next to the ribbon that comes with it and they turn out so beautiful. I get compliments on the gifts all the time.
